work.title: Security Guard
work.description:
Full-time contract as a security guard. On behalf of Securitas, I patrol several buildings at one of their clients' sites in Södertälje.
This also includes report writing and getting called out on fire and emergency alarms, as well as working as a receptionist and escort when needed.

work.title: Supervisor and Administrator
work.description: Part-time work that consisted of making time reports, assistance with daily life planning, planning trips and pay out workers' wages.

work.title: Web Development Intern
work.description: An internship that involved creating a website for a film project. The task consisted of coding HTML, CSS and JavaScript with constant updating of the website after receiving feedback.

work.title: Video Production Intern
work.description: On behalf of Ove Valeskog, I edited trailers for a movie and videos thanking a sponsor who participated in another movie. Ove Valeskog was my supervisor and he works as director and producer in the film, sound and music industry.

work.title: Sound Production Intern
work.description: An internship focused on sound production, as we made a radio show for a movie directed by Sylvelin Måkestad. The work included script writing, voice recording, editing and mixing. Production company: Aldeles.

work.title: Resident Care Assistant
work.description: As a resident care assistant, I take care of elderly people who suffer from dementia. At the nursing home, I take care of the elderly by helping them get dressed, help them take showers, being there for them when they need someone to talk to, and taking them out for strolls. This kind of work also include serving food and drinks for the people who live at the nursing home.

skills.description: Music writing, lyric writing, audio engineering & music production

tools.description: Visual Studio, Sublime Text, Code::Blocks, Eclipse
Avid Pro Tools, Image-Line FL Studio, Apple Logic Pro
Adobe Premiere Pro, Avid Media Composer, Apple Final Cut Pro
